GSD.product_version: versions from v3.9 to before v5.4.151
GSD.description:
mac80211-hwsim: fix late beacon hrtimer handling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.151 by commit 9bee85de2c8155388c09a2e1530a243ec1c96f05, it was introduced in version v3.9 by commit 01e59e467ecf976c782eecd4dc99644802cc60e2. For more details please see the references link.
